title: Interactive Solar System Simulation
description: A stunning 3D solar system with realistic planetary orbits, interactive controls, and educational tooltips. Click planets to learn more about their properties and characteristics.
author: SpaceExplorer

title: Real-time Stock Market Dashboard
description: Beautiful financial dashboard with live stock prices, interactive charts, and portfolio tracking. Features dark/light mode and customizable watchlists.
author: FinTechPro

title: AI-Powered Recipe Generator
description: Smart recipe creator that generates personalized recipes based on your dietary preferences, available ingredients, and cooking skill level.
author: ChefAI

title: Advanced Todo List with AI Suggestions
description: Intelligent task management with AI-powered task suggestions, priority optimization, and productivity insights. Syncs across all your devices.
author: ProductivityGuru

title: Interactive Data Visualization Playground
description: Create stunning charts and graphs from your data. Supports CSV uploads, real-time updates, and export to multiple formats including PNG and SVG.
author: DataVizMaster

title: Meditation & Mindfulness Timer
description: Beautiful meditation timer with ambient sounds, guided sessions, and progress tracking. Perfect for building a consistent mindfulness practice.
author: ZenMaster

title: 3D Cube CSS Animation Gallery
description: Mesmerizing collection of 3D CSS animations featuring rotating cubes, morphing shapes, and interactive hover effects. Pure CSS, no JavaScript!
author: CSSArtist

title: Weather Forecast Widget
description: Sleek weather widget with 7-day forecast, animated weather icons, and location-based updates. Features hourly predictions and weather alerts.
author: WeatherWiz

title: Conway's Game of Life Simulator
description: Interactive implementation of Conway's Game of Life with customizable patterns, speed controls, and preset configurations. Watch evolution unfold!
author: GameOfLifeFan

title: Pomodoro Productivity Timer
description: Focus-enhancing Pomodoro timer with customizable work/break intervals, task tracking, and productivity statistics. Boost your workflow!
author: ProductivityHacker
